seo.title: LocalSend: Share files to nearby devices
seo.description: LocalSend is a free, open-source, cross-platform file sharing tool that allows you to share files to nearby devices.

hero.subtitle: Open source and cross-platform file sharing for everyone.

testimonials.title: Loved by the Community
testimonials.description: Join thousands of users who trust LocalSend for their daily file transfers.

sponsors.title: Supported By
sponsors.description: LocalSend is free and open source, made possible by our partners and community.
sponsors.lambdaTestDescription: Ensuring LocalSend works flawlessly across 3000+ browser and OS environments.
sponsors.becomeSponsorDescription: Love LocalSend? Support development and help keep the project alive.

features.title: Features
features.description: Everything you need for secure, fast file sharing across your local network.
features.decentralizedDescription: Share files without a central server. The file transfer is completely peer-to-peer.
features.crossPlatformDescription: LocalSend is available for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS.
features.freeDescription: LocalSend is free to use. No ads, no tracking, no hidden costs.
features.openSourceDescription: The source code is publicly available. Everyone can contribute to the project.
features.secureDescription: End-to-end encryption ensures that only you and the recipient can access your files.
features.easyDescription: A simple user interface without registration. Other devices are discovered automatically.
features.noInternetDescription: Works completely offline. Your data never leaves your local network.
features.fastDescription: Transfer files at the maximum speed of your WiFi network. No bandwidth limits.

press.title: In the News
press.description: See what tech publications are saying about LocalSend.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about LocalSend.
faq.a1: Yes, LocalSend is 100% free and open source. There are no ads, no tracking, and no hidden costs.
faq.q2: Does it work over the internet?
faq.a2: No. LocalSend uses your local WiFi network to transfer files. Your data never leaves your local network.
faq.a3: Yes. All transfers are encrypted using HTTPS. You can also enable PIN verification for extra security.
faq.a4: Files are saved to your device's Downloads folder by default, but you can change this in the settings.
faq.a5: LocalSend is available for Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS.
faq.q6: Do I need to create an account?
faq.a6: No. LocalSend does not require any account or login. Just install and start sharing.

home.video: Watch a video presentation of LocalSend on YouTube

cta.title: Ready to get started?
cta.description: Download LocalSend now and share files effortlessly across your devices.

seo.description: Get help, get involved, and contribute to LocalSend.

community.title: Community
community.getHelpDescription: Ask or look for answers on GitHub Discussions.
community.getInvolvedDescription: Get in contact with the developers and contribute directly to the project.
community.discordDescription: Join our active server to chat with developers and get instant help.
community.redditDescription: Participate in discussions and stay updated with announcements.
community.issuesDescription: Found a bug? Check our issue tracker.
community.prDescription: Ready to contribute code? Open a PR.

contact.description: Get in touch with the team or the community.
contact.bugReportDescription: Found an issue? Please report it on our GitHub Issues page so we can track and fix it.
contact.emailDescription: For general inquiries, partnership opportunities, or private matters.

footer.description: Share files to nearby devices without internet. Open source, cross-platform, and free.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: Zero configuration. Just install and start sharing.
howItWorks.step1Desc: Download LocalSend on all your devices. No account, no login, no servers.
howItWorks.step2Desc: Choose photos, videos, documents, or text. Any file type is supported.
howItWorks.step3Desc: Tap the nearby device. The transfer happens instantly over your local network.
